column5: Don't worry I am sure Gerritt is on vacation and teaching young Liam how to fish.  Stoty was part of the Hockey Draft he is now the Towel boy  Detroit Lover  Stoty we need some new bass pics
I seem to remember Stoty was undergoing some personal problems he might not have the time or this board might not be a priority right now.
Thats what I was thinking. I hope it all ends up positive for him.
Hope hes alright i saw a post from him i think just not too long ago
I think Stoty is away fishing this week up near Kingston with his buddy.
Could've sworn I just saw a post by Stoty yesterday.. on the other hand, when it comes to OFC that is a long time! lol
Last i saw from Stoty, he was asking about some lake North of Kingston, I think, I know he was asking about some lake where he was supposed to go fish with his buddy. Gerrit, I am not sure.
Gerritt and Stoty disappear at the same time... am I the only one that smells a Honeymoon???
Gerritt's at Lakair pre-fishing for the fall G2G.  JF
He was gone this past weekend for sure.... no idea when he was supposed to get back though.

Broke Back WHHHHHHHAT!?!  I was at Lakair Fishing    Had a blast! Fishing was tough though except for one guy that was short in stature but not in mouth... I will be posing a full report likely tomorrow.. I am beat (Just got in the door)  I also have a question on fishing ethics in relation to this fellow I mention above..  Mike thanks for you're concern bud! but all is well here  G
Its good to see the bouncing blue boy again!
